InstitutionalDepartmentName: Department of Medical Physics and Acoustics
Instructions: Once the audiobook finishes, three questions will appear on your screen. Please answer them by speaking to the instructor.
TaskDescription: After the auditory stimulation, participants answered comprehension questions related to the audiobook content.

list number.Description: Number of sentence lists, each comprising 20 sentences from the Oldenburg Sentence Test (OLSA).

speech intelligibility.Description: Speech intelligibility of the presented sentence, given in percent.

SNR.Description: SNR of the presented list, calculated based on the measured Speech Reception Threshold (SRT) and a fitted psychometric function.
